To play this you need the PSJailbreak USB Dongle

Put this image on an external hard drive & connect it to your PS3.
Load PSJailbreak Menu
Select your game from the hard drive
Exit back to XMB
The Game will appear as though you have inserted the BluRay Disc so you just load the game as normal from there.

You can stare as many games as you like on the HDD but don't change the image name as some games won't load if you do (All games on the HDD show a mini picture in the PSJailbreak menu so you can see what the game no matter what name it has)

Stores who sell the PSJailbreak will not be sued as they do not break any laws in any country in the world.

Anyone can sell anything to play backup/copied games on any Computer or console.

The Only laws say that we the users cannot use the devices/software to play BackUps unless we own the original Game.

Thats why no company has ever managed to get any backup system banned. 
Nintendo tried in the early 90's to ban the Super Magic Drive & it's variants.... They Failed
SEGA tried in the early 90's to ban the Magic Drive & it's variants.... They Failed
Sony tried to ban the Mod Chip in the PSX.. They Failed
Sony Tried to ban the Mod Chip in the PS2.. They Failed
Microsoft tried to ban the Mod Chip in the XBox.. They failed
Microsoft Tried to Ban the flashing of the Xbox360.. They Failed (But won the right to refuse a flashed Xbox360 access to their servers... Making it the only Decision any court has ever taken against us)
